Class tripleplay.ui.MenuHost.Pop

Removed Methods
Pop atEventPos(Position) Positions the menu popup at the given positional event.
Pop atLayerX(Layer, float) Positions the menu horizontally relative to the given layer, with an offset.
Pop atLayerY(Layer, float) Positions the menu vertically relative to the given layer, with an offset.
Pop atScreenPos(float, float) Positions the menu popup at the given screen position.
Pop halign(HAlign) Sets the horizontal alignment of the menu relative to the popup position.
Pop toBottom(float) Positions the bottom edge of the menu relative to the bottom edge of the trigger, offset by the given value.
Pop toLeft(float) Positions the right edge of the menu relative to the left edge of the trigger, offset by the given value.
Pop toRight(float) Positions the left edge of the menu relative to the right edge of the trigger, offset
Pop toTop(float) Positions the top edge of the menu relative to the top edge of the trigger, offset
Pop valign(VAlign) Sets the vertical alignment of the menu relative to the popup position.
